name: InterLooper
description:
Avoid asteroids and your past selves, How many times can you  survive the same loop?

Small game started for the Ludum Dare 46: Stuck in a Loop, and finished just in time for the starting of the next one!  (took me only 6 months to finish a 48 hours game!)
